entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:15 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:21 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

Temperature: -1.1°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6 except minus 11 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6 except minus 11 in low lying inland areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then northeast 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the evening. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023
